settings.heading: What is Koji, and how does it enhance cooking?
settings.row_content: Koji is a type of mold used in traditional fermentation processes to enhance flavors in food. It’s perfect for making miso, soy sauce, or even dry-aged meats.

settings.heading: How do I use your Koji products?
settings.row_content: Each product comes with detailed instructions. Follow the guide provided or explore our blog for recipes and tips.

settings.heading: Are your products suitable for beginners?
settings.row_content: Absolutely! Our products are designed to be beginner-friendly, with easy-to-follow guides

settings.heading: Do you offer vegan-friendly options?
settings.row_content: Yes, many of our products are plant-based and suitable for vegan diets. Check individual product descriptions for more details.

settings.heading: What is the shelf life of your Koji products?
settings.row_content: Most of our products have a shelf life of 6–12 months. Store them in a cool, dry place for the best results.

settings.heading: Do you ship internationally?
settings.row_content: Yes, we ship to select countries worldwide. Shipping fees and delivery times vary based on location.

settings.heading: What is your return and refund policy?
settings.row_content: If you’re not satisfied with your purchase, please contact us within 30 days for assistance. Products must be unused and in their original packaging.

settings.heading: Can I use Koji for home fermentation projects?
settings.row_content: Yes, Koji is perfect for making miso, soy sauce, sake, and other fermented products at home.

settings.heading: Are your products organic and GMO-free?
settings.row_content: Many of our products are organic and GMO-free. Specific details are provided on individual product pages.

settings.heading: How can I contact customer support?
settings.row_content: You can reach out to us via email at [insert email] or use the contact form on our website. We’re happy to help!
